resources.string: The local gnomes have recently got more rowdy than ever. They even started using people\'s tools and materials for their tinkering. A local fisherman remarked, Aye, it’s nae an issue when they’re off on their wee adventures, but the last time I returned to the loch, they had it rigged up to some dodgy makeshift nuclear reactor! Bloody hell. I had nae idea what to do about it, but my auld lass declared that this was well past the point where she draw the line!
